short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search highlighted text on the OSRS Wiki

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to right click on highlighted text to search the OSRS Wiki with ease! See a word you don't recognize from RuneScape on the 2007scape subreddit? No worries, just right click and get the information you need.
